Quiz.privileges_banner_title: Privileges and Rewards to Quiz Participants
Quiz.privileges_line_a: A). Daily Participants : 40 % to 50% Gift Vouchers on Gadgets + Gifts for first 1000 rankers
Quiz.privileges_line_b: B) 30 days regular participants : Month end gifts and felicitation at near by College.
Quiz.privileges_line_c: C) 365 days participants : Top 100 nos. 1 lakh Study Scholarship with Privilege Merit Card
Quiz.privileges_footer: Every month end an open debate will be conducted in your near by Jr.college for Event & Prizes** Relay in TV & social media. For more detail send your enquiries to : email: ........................@gmail.com
